alert.note: Alert for Carroll; Stephenson; Whiteside (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 9:17PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Whiteside, eastern Carroll and southeastern Stephenson Counties through 1000 PM CDT... At 916 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Emerson to near Woodhaven Lakes. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Coleta around 930 PM CDT. Milledgeville around 935 PM CDT. Shannon around 955 PM CDT. German Valley around 1000 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these storms include Yeoward Addition, Whiteside County Airport, Hitt, Galt, Carroll County Fairgrounds, Penrose, Round Grove, Malvern, Como and White Pigeon. This includes Interstate 88 between mile markers 32 and 44. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
